name: Neon Sins -NS#03- Awake
description: (SOUND ON) NS#03: "I get tiresome when my day finishes at work, eyes getting heavy. However as I take my ride back home, looking out of the window, seeing the city buzz back to life, waking up from its morning slumber, all the countless lights and lives that anxiously wait for the night to draw in...seeing all of this, I feel enchanted, almost awake." |||---||| "Neon Sins is a window into the urban sprawling concrete jungle of the neo-future. Come on a journey and witness the city as it comes alive. A hard place for those trying to make an honest living but a haven for those who can't wait to paint the night with their neon sins." |||---||| The whole short can be viewed here: https://youtu.be/2gPfIVbfq2U |||---||| 1920x1080 MP4 AUDIO/VIDEO LOOP
